channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t Fall for CrowdStrike Outage Scams
item.description: Swindlers are spinning up bogus websites in an attempt to dupe people with “CrowdStrike support” scams following the security firm's catastrophic soft...

item.title: Faulty CrowdStrike update causes major global IT outage, taking out banks, airlines and businesses globally
item.description: Security giant CrowdStrike said the outage was not caused by a cyberattack, as businesses anticipate widespread disruption. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rig...

item.title: The Global CrowdStrike Outage Triggered a Surprise Return to Cash
item.description: The event caused chaos at airports, grocery stores, and Starbucks outlets.

item.title: US cyber agency CISA says malicious hackers are ‘taking advantage’ of CrowdStrike outage
item.description: CISA confirmed the CrowdStrike outage was not caused by a cyberattack, but urged caution as malicious hackers exploit the situation. © 2024 TechCrunch...

item.title: The Global IT Outage Sends Hospitals Reeling

item.title: These startups are trying to prevent another CrowdStrike-like outage, according to VCs
item.description: The global outage is a perfect reminder how much of the world relies on technological infrastructure. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pers...

item.title: Why the Global CrowdStrike Outage Hit Airports So Hard
item.description: The aviation industry is optimized within an inch of its life. A bad software update from cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike took down computers running M...

item.title: CrowdStrike outage: How your plane, train and automobile travel may be affected
item.description: The CrowdStrike outage that hit early Friday morning and knocked out computers running Microsoft Windows has grounded flights globally. Major U.S. air...

item.title: A Chaotic History of Clickolding, the Year’s Most Disturbing Game

item.title: Twitch reinstates Trump’s account ahead of the 2024 presidential election
